name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SideTab |浏览器侧边栏 open any page in side bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
设置任意网站为侧边栏 打开，快速访问对比一键直达～
🚀 SideTab - 让您的浏览体验焕然一新！

还在为频繁切换标签页而烦恼吗？✨ 试试  SideTab  吧！这款智能浏览器扩展为您带来一个简洁优雅的侧边栏，只需轻松拖放，即可同时浏览多个网页，就是这么简单！

💡  SideTab  独特优势： • 拖放即用，便捷访问您喜爱的网站 • 智能搜索：直接拖动选中文本，无需打开新标签页即可搜索 • 无缝多任务处理，保持工作专注 • 轻量级设计，不影响浏览器性能

🎯 完美适用于： • 学习研究 • 快速对比 • 社交媒体监控 • 快速信息查询 

🚀 Transform Your Browsing Experience with  SideTab  - Your Smart Browser Companion!

Ever wished you could view multiple websites at once without the hassle of tab-switching? ✨ Meet sidetab, your new favorite browser extension that brings a sleek, customizable sidebar to your browser! Simply drag and drop any website to view it alongside your main content - it's that easy!

💡 What makes sidetab special? • Instant access to your favorite websites with a simple drag-and-drop • Smart search feature: drag highlighted text to instantly search without opening new tabs • Seamless multitasking that keeps you in your flow • Lightning-fast and lightweight design that won't slow you down

🎯 Perfect for: • Research and writing • Comparison shopping • Social media monitoring • Quick reference lookups • And so much more!

Boost your productivity and make tab-juggling a thing of the past! With sidetab, everything you need is just a glance away in your browser's sidebar. Try it now and experience a smoother, more organized way of browsing! 🌟
